text: Atahpara tini yakhana tara pitara sathe kaja karara mata bayase upanita halena, takhana ibarahima balalena, 'he priya batsa! Ami sbapne dekhi ye, tomake ami yabeha karachi [1], ekhana tomara abhimata ki bala?' Tini balalena, 'he amara pita! Apani ya adesapraapta hayechena ta-i karuna. Allahara icchaya apani amake dhairyasila pabena
